global_policy.description: Rejection if aggregated weighted score exceeds threshold, OR if any P1 metric fails its absolute constraint.

metrics.description: Quantifies algorithmic cost increase (e.g., cyclomatic complexity, memory footprint delta) relative to baseline.
Ensures transparency. Decrease (negative change) in the auditability score relative to baseline must not exceed this ratio. Increased weight from 0.25.
Measures future maintenance debt, external dependency friction, and internal coupling. Weight decreased from 0.35.
Tracks structural entropy (disorder, mutation rate) relative to codebase state machine history. Activated metric with dedicated weight.
